title: Epitaph for Libios
support: Six joining fragments of a marble plaque, damaged on the left.

handNote.lettering: Regular letters, Α with upper serif, lunate Ε and Σ, Κ with arms detached from the upright.

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, probably Catania.

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Ferrara and Kaibel in Museo Biscari, in a more complete state, later by Korhonen in magazzino superiore, collezione Biscari, formerly sala IX, 79.

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana
